channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 03:01 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv district
item.description: 🟡 03:01 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv district#m_harkiv_tha_tha_harkivska_harkivskaya_The. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 03:01 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Kharkiv Territorial Community and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
